track.name: Andy, You're a Star
comments: It's interesting that a lot of people can only like this song if they persuade themselves it's all about a gay crush.
lmao its obvious this is a sarcastic song, people thought this was supposed to be a gay anthem or sumshit?
I still like to pretend Brandon had a crush about a guy called Andy
Cause Andy you're a star, in nobody's eyes but mine.
It's a sarcastic song about a guy he hated at high school.
not too sure bout this one

Rumour: “Andy You’re a Star” on Hot Fuss about a boy you had a crush on in high school.
A. “No. I’ve always been very aware of my sexuality. I’m very comfortable with that. I do like women. From very early on. Probably too early.” http://www.dose.ca/music/story.html?id=3b429c1c-99e0-4343-8a75-2ae52a589124 Proof, btw.

It's interesting that a lot of people can only like this song if they persuade themselves it's not about a homosexual crush. [5] It's not, though. Brandon's even spoken about it. He hasn't said what it IS about.. but it'll always be a romantic/cute gay love song for me.
Gay or not gay, awesome is still awesome. And this is epic.
LMAO so true, but doesnt change the fact its a true life and a good song
It's interesting that a lot of people can only like this song if they persuade themselves it's not about a homosexual crush. [4]
